sentences.en: Among her many virtues are loyalty, courage, and truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 她有许多的美德,如忠诚 、 勇敢和诚实.

sentences.en: Among IT a lot virtues are not loyalty, courage, and truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 她有很多美德,如忠诚 、 勇敢 、 率真.

sentences.en: And it raises in a new way the problem of truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 而真实性也以新的方式发生了疑问.

sentences.en: Arbitrariness and truthfulness are two basic characteristics of oral confession.
sentences.cn: 摘要任意性和真实性是口供的两个基本特征.

sentences.en: Baseball builds character through personal responsibility, teamwork, truthfulness and honor!
sentences.cn: 棒球培养责任感 、 团队精神 、 正义感和自信.

sentences.en: Combine a light and dark blue to convey trust and truthfulness - banker's colors.
sentences.cn: 结合了轻型和深蓝色转达信任和真诚 - 银行家的颜色.

sentences.en: Doubt stole up on me about his truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 我渐渐地对他的真诚产生了怀疑.

sentences.en: Effectiveness and truthfulness are not identical, and even are not always consistent.
sentences.cn: 有效性和真理性不仅不能等同, 而且也不是始终统一的.

sentences.en: I am satisfied of the truthfulness of his statement.
sentences.cn: 我相信他的话是真实的.

sentences.en: I fired a hundred questions concerning the truthfulness of his statement.
sentences.cn: 我对他发言的真实性提出一连串质问.

sentences.en: I've read this report carefully and I can vouch for its truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 我已仔细看过这份报告,我可以保证它的真实性.

sentences.en: Jennifer Beals: For my character, it's loyalty and truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 就我的角色来说, 是忠诚和真实.

sentences.en: The eye speaks with an eloquence and truthfulness surpassing speech.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的表情比讲话有力而传神.

sentences.en: The reporter raised a question touching the truthfulness of his statements.
sentences.cn: 记者对他发言的真实性提出疑问。

sentences.en: The university committee said It'strongly questions the truthfulness of that report.
sentences.cn: 大学委员会称对此报告的真实性持重大怀疑.

sentences.en: They got into a dispute with truthfulness of my conclusion.
sentences.cn: 4他们对我的结论的真实性提出质疑.
